name: Inner Garden: Flower Garden 1
description:
Expansion pack for the Inner Garden free app. Requires an up-to-date installation of Inner Garden.

This pack contains a selection of flowers in a variety of shapes, colors and sizes - from daffodils to blooming horse chestnut. Azaleas or hydrangeas both available in three different colors allow you to paint with color. Gentle patches of lavender contrast with tall silhouettes of canna lily and foxtail lily, complemented by three colors of asters. The pack also contains five new surfaces: English-style herring-bone brick pavement, three types of flowering meadow (blue crocuses, dandelions and poppies) as well as white daffodils. The number of combinations of shapes and colors is innumerable!
